pages.text: $(li)The Ring of Experience makes you obtain more experience levels than normally.$(br)$(li)It can only be found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) inside of the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_keep)Ruined Keep$(/l).
$(li)This ring can not be equipped, you have to hold it in your offhand to active its effects.
